document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Europe, Caucasus, Asia Minor , Kazakhstan , West Siberia ( Colonnelli 2013 ).

Biology. Grasslands and forests. Adults occur in IV–VIII. Oligophagouson Boraginaceae :
Asperugo procumbens
,
Borago officinalis
,
Cynoglossum creticum
,
Myosotis ramosissima
,
M. sylvatica ( Hoffmann 1954 )
;
M. scorpioides
( Hoffmann 1954 ; Dieckmann 1972b ; Smreczyński 1974 );
Aegonychon purpureocaeruleum
,
Anchusa azurea
,
Echium vulgare
,
M. arvensis
,
Pulmonaria officinalis
( Hoffmann 1954 ; Smreczyński 1974 );
Buglossoides arvensis
,
Cynoglossum officinale
,
Symphytum officinale
( Hoffmann 1954 ; Smreczyński 1974 ; Kryzhanovskaya 1977 );
S. asperum ( Kryzhanovskaya 1977 )
;
M. popovii
,
Pontechium maculatum
,
Pulmonaria obscura (Isayev 2007)
;
Nonea pulla
,
Pulmonaria mollis ( Dedyukhin 2012 )
.
